product_requirements.description: AI-Powered Course Recommendation System with 98K+ courses from Udemy
product_requirements.author: Ajay Mathuriya
product_requirements.institution: Minor in AI from IIT Ropar

requirements.title: Course Search API
requirements.description: Users should be able to search across 98,104+ courses with fuzzy matching and intelligent scoring
acceptance_criteria: Search should return relevant courses based on title, category, description, and instructor
Search results should be ranked by relevance score
Search should handle typos and partial matches
API should return results in under 2 seconds
Maximum 12 courses returned per search

requirements.title: AI Course Recommendations
requirements.description: System should provide ML-based course recommendations using TF-IDF and cosine similarity
acceptance_criteria: Recommendations based on course similarity using 5000-dimension vectors
Should provide 10 similar courses for any given course ID
Fallback to category-based recommendations if ML model fails
Recommendations should be relevant and diverse

requirements.title: Trending Courses
requirements.description: Display trending courses based on subscriber count
acceptance_criteria: Sort courses by number of subscribers (descending)
Return top 10 trending courses
Include course metadata (title, rating, price, instructor)
Update trending list dynamically

requirements.title: Top Rated Courses
requirements.description: Show highest rated courses with quality filters
acceptance_criteria: Filter courses with rating >= 4.0 and reviews >= 10
Sort by rating (descending)
Return top 10 rated courses
Fallback to all courses if not enough high-rated ones

requirements.title: Frontend Course Browser
requirements.description: Interactive web interface for course discovery
acceptance_criteria: Responsive design working on desktop and mobile
Search with live suggestions
Horizontal scrolling course carousels
Course detail modals with recommendations
Watchlist functionality with local storage
User profile and preferences management

requirements.title: Static Asset Serving
requirements.description: Serve frontend assets and media files efficiently
acceptance_criteria: Serve HTML, CSS, JS files with proper MIME types
Handle asset requests with appropriate caching headers
Serve course images with fallback for missing images
All static routes should respond in under 100ms

requirements.title: API Health and Status
requirements.description: Provide system health and status endpoints
acceptance_criteria: Health check endpoint returns system status
Model status endpoint shows AI/ML system readiness
Include configuration and data loading status
Response time under 50ms

requirements.title: Personalized Recommendations
requirements.description: Optional Udemy API integration for personalized course suggestions
acceptance_criteria: Integration with Udemy API for real-time data
User preference-based filtering (mood, language, budget)
Fallback to local recommendations if API fails
Respect rate limits and handle API errors gracefully
